settings.title: Example 2: Testing R output
settings.description: This scriptlet is made for testing and demonstration purposes. It writes different types of R data into the standard output variables and creates a plot. You need to drag and drop at least one patient set to a field but the data won't be processed by the R script. Click on "View results" to see how GIRI displays the output.
settings.resultDescription: Please take a look at the corresponding R script to see which output belongs to which data type.
settings.plotDescription: Here you can describe the plots
